quote: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
It is not the strongest of the species that survives, but the most adaptable.
Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
The difference between winning and losing is most often not quitting.
To know what you know and what you do not know, that is true knowledge.
Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Wishing is not enough; we must do.
Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
I'm a greater believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it.
Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
I never dreamed about success, I worked for it.
Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen.
The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand.
I do not know anyone who has got to the top without hard work.
Satisfaction lies in the effort, not in the attainment.
All growth depends upon activity. There is no development physically or intellectually without effort.
Diamonds are nothing more than chunks of coal that stuck to their jobs.
The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
I learned the value of hard work by working hard.
Nothing ever comes to one, that is worth having, except as a result of hard work.
Opportunities are usually disguised as hard work, so most people don't recognize them.
A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.
There is no substitute for hard work.
Do not wait; the time will never be 'just right.' Start where you stand.
What you lack in talent can be made up with desire, hustle and giving 110% all the time.
It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
Our greatest weakness lies in giving up.
Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
You just can't beat the person who never gives up.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, 'I will try again tomorrow.'
The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
Fall seven times and stand up eight.
Success is not built on success. It's built on failure. It's built on frustration. Sometimes it's built on catastrophe.
Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear.
Permanence, perseverance and persistence in spite of all obstacles, discouragements, and impossibilities: It is this that distinguishes the strong soul from the weak.
Character consists of what you do on the third and fourth tries.
You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
A champion is defined not by their wins but by how they can recover when they fall.
Rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.
The trouble with not having a goal is that you can spend your life running up and down the field and never score.
Goals are dreams with deadlines.
If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
A goal is not always meant to be reached, it often serves simply as something to aim at.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
The greater danger for most of us lies not in setting our aim too high and falling short, but in setting our aim too low and achieving our mark.
Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
Review your goals twice every day in order to be focused on achieving them.
Goals may give focus, but dreams give power.
Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.
You should set goals beyond your reach so you always have something to live for.
The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
In the absence of clearly-defined goals, we become strangely loyal to performing daily trivia until ultimately we become enslaved by it.
The major reason for setting a goal is for what it makes of you to accomplish it.
Goals allow you to control the direction of change in your favor.
You must have long-range goals to keep you from being frustrated by short-range failures.
The tragedy in life doesn't lie in not reaching your goal. The tragedy lies in having no goal to reach.
People with goals succeed because they know where they're going.
Concentration is the secret of strength.
The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
Stay focused, go after your dreams and keep moving toward your goals.
Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
You will never change your life until you change something you do daily.
Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
With self-discipline most anything is possible.
Self-respect is the fruit of discipline.
Discipline is the soul of an army.
The only discipline that lasts is self-discipline.
Discipline is the refining fire by which talent becomes ability.
No man is free who is not master of himself.
Self-discipline begins with the mastery of your thoughts.
Discipline is remembering what you want.
Without discipline, there's no life at all.
The ability to discipline yourself to delay gratification in the short term in order to enjoy greater rewards in the long term is the indispensable prerequisite for success.
Self-control is strength. Right thought is mastery. Calmness is power.
Time is more valuable than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
Never spend your money before you have it.
An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver.
Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
Don't tell me where your priorities are. Show me where you spend your money and I'll tell you what they are.
It's not how much money you make, but how much money you keep, how hard it works for you, and how many generations you keep it for.
Money often costs too much.
If you would be wealthy, think of saving as well as getting.
The real measure of your wealth is how much you'd be worth if you lost all your money.
Wealth is the ability to fully experience life.
Money won't create success, the freedom to make it will.
The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything, but the value of nothing.
Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
I'm only rich because I know when I'm wrong.
Buy when everyone else is selling and hold until everyone else is buying.
The way to wealth depends on just two words, industry and frugality.
A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.
I will tell you how to become rich. Close the doors. Be fearful when others are greedy. Be greedy when others are fearful.
Money is multiplied in practical value depending on the number of W's you control in your life.
Whether you think you can, or you think you can't – you're right.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
The mind is everything. What you think you become.
Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement.
Change your thoughts and you change your world.
You cannot have a positive life and a negative mind.
A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events and outcomes.
The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change his future by merely changing his attitude.
Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
Excellence is not a skill, it's an attitude.
The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character.
A strong positive mental attitude will create more miracles than any wonder drug.
It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
We become what we think about most of the time.
The only disability in life is a bad attitude.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
An idea not coupled with action will never get any bigger than the brain cell it occupied.
Action is the foundational key to all success.
Well done is better than well said.
Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice.
The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
Even if you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.
Vision without action is merely a dream. Action without vision just passes the time. Vision with action can change the world.
Things may come to those who wait, but only the things left by those who hustle.
Take action! An inch of movement will bring you closer to your goals than a mile of intention.
Action may not always bring happiness, but there is no happiness without action.
You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.
An ounce of action is worth a ton of theory.
Action cures fear, inaction creates terror.
The great end of life is not knowledge but action.
Thinking will not overcome fear but action will.
Remember, people will judge you by your actions, not your intentions.
In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing, the next best thing is the wrong thing, and the worst thing you can do is nothing.
The world is changed by your example, not by your opinion.
